mapper.select: SELECT FLD_ID, FLD_NM, FLD_LVL, FLD_PARENT_ID, FLD_ORDINAL, FLD_DESC FROM PUB_FLD_MSTR ORDER BY FLD_LVL ASC, FLD_ORDINAL ASC
SELECT FLD_ID, FLD_NM, FLD_PARENT_ID, 'false' AS AUTH_VIEW, 'false' AS AUTH_PUBLISH, 'false' AS AUTH_DATAITEM, 'false' AS AUTH_EXPORT FROM PUB_FLD_MSTR ORDER BY FLD_LVL ASC, FLD_ORDINAL ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USER_FLD_MSTR WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo}

SELECT REPORTANDFOLDER.ID, REPORTANDFOLDER.NAME, REPORTANDFOLDER.FLD_LVL, REPORTANDFOLDER.ORDINAL, REPORTANDFOLDER.FLD_PARENT_ID, REPORTANDFOLDER.TYPE, REPORTANDFOLDER.SUBTITLE, REPORTANDFOLDER.TAG, REPORTANDFOLDER.DESCRIPTION, REPORTANDFOLDER.QUERY, REPORTANDFOLDER.CREATED_DATE, REPORTANDFOLDER.PROMPT, REPORTANDFOLDER.CREATED_BY FROM ( SELECT FLD_ID AS ID, FLD_NM AS NAME, FLD_LVL, FLD_ORDINAL AS ORDINAL, FLD_PARENT_ID, CAST('FOLDER' AS NVARCHAR2(20)) AS TYPE, NULL AS SUBTITLE, NULL AS TAG, NULL AS DESCRIPTION, NULL AS QUERY, NULL AS PROMPT, NULL AS CREATED_DATE, #{userNm} AS CREATED_BY FROM USER_FLD_MSTR WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} UNION ALL SELECT REPORT_ID AS ID, REPORT_NM AS NAME, 987654321 AS FLD_LVL, REPORT_ORDINAL AS ORDINAL, FLD_ID AS FLD_PARENT_ID, REPORT_TYPE AS TYPE, REPORT_SUB_TITLE AS SUBTITLE, REPORT_TAG AS TAG, REPORT_DESC AS DESCRIPTION, DATASET_QUERY AS QUERY, PROMPT_YN AS PROMPT, REG_DT AS CREATED_DATE, #{userNm} AS CREATED_BY FROM REPORT_MSTR WHERE FLD_ID IN ( SELECT FLD_ID FROM USER_FLD_MSTR WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} ) AND DEL_YN = 'N' ) REPORTANDFOLDER
mapper.update:
UPDATE REPORT_MSTR SET
REPORT_NM = #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REPORT_TYPE = #{type, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REPORT_SUB_TITLE = #{subtitle, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REPORT_TAG = #{tag, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REPORT_DESC = #{desc, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROMPT_YN = #{prompt, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
WHERE REPORT_ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_FLD_MSTR( FLD_ID, USER_NO, FLD_NM, FLD_LVL, FLD_PARENT_ID, FLD_ORDINAL, FLD_DESC ) VALUES( USER_FLD_MSTR_FLD_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{userNo, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fldLvl, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fldParentId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ordinal, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{desc, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: SELECT CONFIG_MSTR.MAIN_TITLE, CONFIG_MSTR.DEFAULT_LAYOUT, CONFIG_MSTR.LICENSES_KEY, CONFIG_MSTR.WEB_URL, WB_CONFIG_MSTR.LOGIN_IMAGE, WB_CONFIG_MSTR.LOGO, WB_CONFIG_MSTR.SPREAD_JS_LICENSE, WB_CONFIG_MSTR.SPREAD_JS_DESIGNER_LICENSE, WB_CONFIG_MSTR.KAKAO_MAP_API_KEY, WB_CONFIG_MSTR.MENU_CONFIG FROM CONFIG_MSTR INNER JOIN WB_CONFIG_MSTR ON 1 = 1
SELECT FLD_ID, FLD_NM, PARENT_FLD_ID, FLD_ORDINAL FROM DATASET_FLD_MSTR ORDER BY FLD_ID, FLD_ORDINAL

SELECT PUB_FLD_MSTR.FLD_ID, PUB_FLD_MSTR.FLD_NM, PUB_FLD_MSTR.FLD_LVL, PUB_FLD_MSTR.FLD_PARENT_ID, PUB_FLD_MSTR.FLD_ORDINAL, REPORT_MSTR.REPORT_ID, REPORT_MSTR.REPORT_NM, REPORT_MSTR.REPORT_SUB_TITLE, USER_MSTR.USER_ID, REPORT_MSTR.REG_DT, REPORT_MSTR.REPORT_TAG, REPORT_MSTR.REPORT_ORDINAL, REPORT_MSTR.REPORT_DESC, REPORT_MSTR.REPORT_TYPE FROM PUB_FLD_MSTR INNER JOIN REPORT_MSTR ON PUB_FLD_MSTR.FLD_ID = REPORT_MSTR.FLD_ID INNER JOIN USER_MSTR ON USER_MSTR.USER_NO = REPORT_MSTR.REG_USER_NO WHERE REPORT_MSTR.DEL_YN = 'N' AND USER_MSTR.DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY 3 ASC, 5 ASC

SELECT GRP_AUTH_REPORT_MSTR_TEMP.GRP_ID, PUB_FLD_MSTR.FLD_ID, PUB_FLD_MSTR.FLD_NM, PUB_FLD_MSTR.FLD_LVL, PUB_FLD_MSTR.FLD_PARENT_ID, PUB_FLD_MSTR.FLD_ORDINAL, GRP_AUTH_REPORT_MSTR_TEMP.AUTH_VIEW, GRP_AUTH_REPORT_MSTR_TEMP.AUTH_PUBLISH, GRP_AUTH_REPORT_MSTR_TEMP.AUTH_DATAITEM, GRP_AUTH_REPORT_MSTR_TEMP.AUTH_EXPORT FROM PUB_FLD_MSTR INNER JOIN GRP_AUTH_REPORT_MSTR_TEMP ON PUB_FLD_MSTR.FLD_ID = GRP_AUTH_REPORT_MSTR_TEMP.FLD_ID ORDER BY GRP_AUTH_REPORT_MSTR_TEMP.GRP_ID, PUB_FLD_MSTR.FLD_ID DESC, PUB_FLD_MSTR.FLD_LVL ASC, PUB_FLD_MSTR.FLD_ORDINAL ASC
mapper.update:
UPDATE CONFIG_MSTR SET
MAIN_TITLE = #{mainTitle, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LICENSES_KEY = #{licensesKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WEB_URL = #{webUrl, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEFAULT_LAYOUT = #{adHocLayout, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAIN_TAB_EX = MAIN_TAB_EX WHERE 1 = 1

UPDATE WB_CONFIG_MSTR SET
LOGIN_IMAGE = #{loginImage, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOGO = #{logo, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SPREAD_JS_LICENSE = #{spreadJsLicense, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SPREAD_JS_DESIGNER_LICENSE = #{spreadJsDesignLicense, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
KAKAO_MAP_API_KEY = #{kakaoMapApiKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MENU_CONFIG = #{menuConfig, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REPORT_DIRECT_VIEW = REPORT_DIRECT_VIEW WHERE 1 = 1

UPDATE PUB_FLD_MSTR SET
FLD_LVL = #{fldLvl, jdbcType=INTEGER},
FLD_PARENT_ID = #{fldParentId, jdbcType=INTEGER},
FLD_ORDINAL = #{fldOrdinal, jdbcType=INTEGER},
FLD_DESC = #{fldDesc, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FLD_NM = #{fldNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FLD_ID = FLD_ID WHERE FLD_ID = #{fldId, jdbcType=INTEGER}
